data.text: @juan_nations @ScottGottliebMD @nytimes We have substantially more immunity now That's why it would change

Biden doesn't exactly conjure JFK! https://t.co/gkKt28OVvm

@ScottGottliebMD @nytimes This is to deal with a pandemic without a proper medicine. Not professional and unlikely to work.  We need a working medicine to block covid death and illness effectively. No herd immunity for us. We are humans, not herd like cows
@hz_udhr @ScottGottliebMD @nytimes California stats include incidental/ prior infections. Where I worked in LA they are very rarely admitting anyone with actual covid disease
